notes.note:
For new users, the address bar's default position has moved from the bottom of the screen to the top. The [Customize > Toolbar][1] setting can be used to move the toolbar back to the bottom.


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/move-navigation-bar

Firefox now uses `resizes-visual` as the default value of the [`interactive-widget`][1] property of the viewport `<meta>` element. This means that when the software keyboard is shown, Firefox resizes the page's visual viewport but not its layout viewport, avoiding an expensive reflow and resulting in a more usable layout on many pages.


  [1]: https://drafts.csswg.org/css-viewport/#interactive-widget-section
